name: Block Buddies (Daniel Dababneh)
description:
This is Block Buddies! A game where you try to out perform your friends. Make it as far as you can by jumping on the randomly generated platforms. Change colors to land on the different colored platforms. The red block can jump onto the red platforms, and the blue block can jump onto the blue platform. 

Controls:

- A & D to move left and right.

- Space to jump.

- O to switch to Blue, P to switch to Red.

Additional Credits:

Font: https://www.dafont.com/vcr-osd-mono.font

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org

Songs: ARCADE PUZZLER & UP THE LADDER

Repository:
https://github.com/DirtyDanChicago/ExperimentalGame
